nodes.text: Security in Strength & Order in Obedience

Security in Strength & Order in Obedience was a propaganda artwork created for the Galactic Empire. It depicted a trio of front-facing Imperial II-class Star Destroyers. Both the image and text featured on the poster were approved by the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order. It was featured within the Imperial Handbook: A Commander's Guide, citing why the third principle of the Tarkin Doctrine was necessary, and especially the importance of backing up threats.
